Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Longport in 1980...
Traded from Longport to Wisconsin on 3/2/1980 (Going to LP: 3B S. Coleman, 2B R. Rochon, CF E. Godines, 1B A. Durso. Going to WIS: CF S. Stumpf, P J. Lavergne)...

Hit first career homerun on 4/24/1984, off Lyndon Williamson (NJ)...
